schema_properties.schema_description: description of all properties not captured by the OIMS core

file_descriptors.metadata_description: metametadata of the Foresight Initiative data and collection OIMS compatible metadata

instructions: Please provide the title of the collection of datasets
Please provide the subtitle of the dataset
Please provide a brief description of the dataset
Please specify the version of the dataset
Specify the version of the entity
Choose from the available version types
Provide any additional details about this version
Please add the license information

metadata.attribute_description: Name of the non-standard license or user agreement
instructions: Please specify the name of the non-standard license

metadata.attribute_description: Full text of the non-standard license or user agreement
instructions: Please provide the full text of the non-standard license

metadata.attribute_description: URL of the non-standard license or user agreement
instructions: Please provide the URL of the non-standard license

metadata.attribute_description: Name of the organization holding rights to the asset
instructions: Specify the rights holder's name
Indicate whether access is open or restricted
Provide the embargo date if applicable
Provide details about the asset contact person or organization

metadata.attribute_description: name of the contact (can be an organization)
instructions: Provide the name of the person or organization
provide the contact email address

metadata.attribute_description: Information about the creator(s) of the asset
instructions: Provide details about the asset creators
Provide the full name of the creator
Provide the full name of the creator
Provide the full name of the creator
Specify the affiliation of the creator
Provide the creator's identifier (e.g.  ORCID)
Specify the identifier scheme (e.g.  ORCID)
Provide the actual identifier
Specify the creator's role (e.g. Principal Investigator)

metadata.attribute_description: Information about contributors to the asset
instructions: Specify the contributors and their roles
Specify the type of contributor (e.g. funder, collaborator)
Provide the name of the contributor
Specify the time period covered by the asset

metadata.attribute_description: Start date of the time period covered
instructions: Provide the start date of the coverage period

metadata.attribute_description: End date of the time period covered
instructions: Provide the end date of the coverage period

metadata.attribute_description: Resolution of the time period covered
instructions: Specify the resolution of the temporal coverage (e.g. yearly, monthly)
Specify the geographic area covered by the asset

metadata.attribute_description: the geographic coverage indicates the the lowest level of the full data coverage of the asset.
instructions: boolean value, FALSE if the coverage is blurred to for instance sensitivity issues

metadata.attribute_description: Regions covered by the asset, e.g. CGIAR regions
instructions: Specify the regions covered by the asset
Specify the countries covered by the asset
Specify the agro-ecological zones covered
Provide details about the administrative units covered
Specify the type of administrative unit (e.g. distrivt, municipality)
Provide the code of the administrative unit

metadata.attribute_description: the url of the code description

instructions: Provide the name of the administrative unit
Provide the classification link for the administrative unit name
Provide other spatial classifications used

metadata.attribute_description: Name of the other spatial classification
instructions: Provide the name of the other spatial classification

metadata.attribute_description: URL of the other spatial classification
instructions: Provide the URL of the other spatial classification

metadata.attribute_description: Element ID of the other spatial classification
instructions: Provide the element ID of the other spatial classification

metadata.attribute_description: geospatial coordinates of the asset if applicable
NW corner of the area covered
NW corner of the area covered
SE corner of the area covered
SE corner of the area covered
if central point of the area covered is used latitude of the centroid
if central point of the area covered is used longitude of the centroid

instructions: if a centroid is provided the size of the grid is essential

metadata.attribute_description: data contains more granular geographic coverage information

instructions: Provide keywords that describe the dataset

metadata.attribute_description: Vocabulary to which the keyword belongs
instructions: e.g. AGROVOC,GACS,AgrO, JEL)
Even if multiple units of analysis are possible  choose wisely, a household survey can contain some individual level data, but the main focus is at the household level.

metadata.attribute_description: temporal method applied this can be time series, longitudanal or both as in a panel dataset
instructions: longitudinal, panel, time series

metadata.attribute_description: the data in the asset has a source, this source can be described.
instructions:
Even though multiple options are possible, most data sets will have a single source. Multiple sources is usually relevant with combinbed derived datasets.

Choose from: Survey
Census
Statistics
Observations
Machine generated
online content

metadata.attribute_description: single, continuous, hourly, daily, weekly, bi-weekly monthly, yearly etc. (specify if not in list)
instructions: Usually only one is relevant, but there may be exceptional cases where more than one frequency is applicable.

metadata.attribute_description: response rate for primary Human Subjects Research data collection

instructions: provide some information (free text)
e.g. economics, health, social sciences, agricultural sciences, meteorology

CGIAR focus area focus
1 = Climate adaptation & mitigation

2 = Environmental health & biodiversity 
3 = Nutrition, health & food security 
4 = Poverty reduction, livelihoods & jobs 
5 = Gender equality, youth & social inclusion.
no ethics review required
no ethics review applied
exempt
expedited
full review

metadata.attribute_description: if ethics review was undertaken, this is sometimes done with multiple bodies, provide all relevant information
instructions: use a column for each ethics review submission pertinent for this data set

metadata.attribute_description: information on the official registration of the ethics review body
in what country is the IRB registered
under what code is the IRB registered
reference code of the IRB review
the data contains personally identifiable information such as names, telephone numbers etc.
instructions: boolean value

metadata.attribute_description: The data contains indirecxt persoanlly identifiable information such as household rosters, or any information that in combination with other information can lead to reidentification of the respondents
instructions: boolean value

metadata.attribute_description: The data contains granular geo-spatial coordinates
instructions: boolean value

metadata.attribute_description: number of decimal points specificity of geo-spatial coordinates
instructions: integer

metadata.attribute_description: The data contains sensitive information such as information about crime, politically sensitive information, domestic  violence, etc.
instructions: boolean value

metadata.attribute_description: what kind of sensitive information does the data contain
instructions: text, use separate columns for different types of sensitive information

metadata.attribute_description: key documenation related to the asset
instructions: fill in the information for each document in a separate column
last name, first name or initial
(separated by a semi-colon)
journal article
book
book chapter
report
etc.
year

metadata.attribute_description: e.g. journal name, volume and issue
instructions: citation information except for authors, title and year of publication.
Provide only one persistent identifier per document

metadata.attribute_description: what is the persistent identifier type
instructions: DOI
Handle
ISBN
URL

metadata.attribute_description: actual identifier e.g. DOI link; handle link or URL
link to an OIMS compatible metadata file for the publication
instructions: if metadata is in this template answer is self

metadata.attribute_description: Does the metadata file contain only the metadata of this publication or contain metadata for multiple items
instructions: single or multiple
Please provide the title of the collection of collections
Please provide the subtitle of the collection
Please provide a brief description of the collection
Please specify the version of the collection
Please add the license information
integer and size indicator (Byte, KB, MB, TB)
provide the link (URL) if possible and not just the DOI or handle, as DOIs do not always point to the exact files.
none, if not encrypted

metadata.attribute_description: Access requirements to use the file
This could include information about the version of the data file, especially if multiple versions of the same data file exist.
This could include information about the version of the data file, especially if multiple versions of the same data file exist.

This could include information about how the data was checked for completeness, accuracy, and consistency. It could also include details about any data cleaning or transformation procedures that were performed
This could include information about how the data was processed, including any algorithms or models used, and the parameters that were used in the processing.
This could include information about any other data files that are needed to use the current data file
Changes relative to the previous version
any data quality issues not covered elsewhere that need to be known for reuse of the data
instructions: free text

metadata.attribute_description: data source or origin could also be useful for tracking where the data came from and who is responsible for it
instructions:
choose from:
original data
provenance information here
provenance in data file
url

metadata.attribute_description: if the provenance informatiuon is embedded in the data file indoicate the location of this information
instructions: one or more relevant variable identifiers containing provenance information

metadata.attribute_description: Interview or observation setting (e.g., in-person, phone, video conference)
instructions: usually it has a single value, but may have multiple if applicable

metadata.attribute_description: any variable level notes, comments and remarks
were there problems with translation of variables from local language to current language
instructions: check if there were problems with translation of variables from local language to current language

metadata.attribute_description: provide a brief description of this file, examples can be description of the questionnaire section covered by the file.
if relevant for the data file: The purpose or research question that the data file addresses could be included in the descriptive metadata.

If unstructured data , please indicate the Interview or observation protocol (e.g., structured interview, key informant interview, focus group discussion, semi-structured interview, ethnographic observation, field notes)
if the interbiew or observation proticol is availablke externally, please provide the link to the protocol url

if the data is in a text file (e.g. Doc

instructions: if the data container can be identified with tags: start tag

metadata.attribute_description: end tag if container van be identified with tags
